hypothesis_content.title: BTC Momentum Breakout After 3-Day Consolidation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC consolidates within a ±1.5% range for 3 consecutive days during NEUTRAL/BULL regimes, a breakout above the consolidation high with >15% volume spike triggers a momentum continuation move of +3-5% within 48 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended consolidation during neutral/bull regimes represents accumulation; breakout with volume confirmation suggests institutional/whale participation. Crypto momentum tends to persist due to retail FOMO and algorithmic trend-following.
entry_conditions: BTC 3-day price range ≤ 1.5% (high-low relative to close)
Current price breaks above 3-day consolidation high
Volume on breakout candle > 15% above 20-period moving average
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain >1% above consolidation high within 4 hours, or price returns inside consolidation range within 12 hours.
